channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Notes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Notes

item.title: CVE-2021-25498|2024-08-03T20:03:05.614Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: A possible buffer overflow vulnerability in maetd_eco_cb_mode of libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Notes version 4.3.02.61 allows arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-25355|2024-08-03T20:03:05.414Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Using unsafe PendingIntent in Samsung Notes prior to version 4.2.00.22 allows local attackers unauthorized action without permission via hijacking the PendingIntent.

item.title: CVE-2021-25495|2024-08-03T20:03:05.855Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: A possible heap buffer overflow vulnerability in libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Note version 4.3.02.61 allows arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-25492|2024-08-03T20:03:05.753Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Lack of boundary checking of a buffer in libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Note version 4.3.02.61 allows OOB read.

item.title: CVE-2021-25497|2024-08-03T20:03:05.753Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: A possible buffer overflow vulnerability in maetd_cpy_slice of libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Notes version 4.3.02.61 allows arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-25496|2024-08-03T20:03:05.665Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: A possible buffer overflow vulnerability in maetd_dec_slice of libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Notes version 4.3.02.61 allows arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-36831|2024-08-03T10:14:28.535Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in UriFileUtils of Samsung Notes prior to version 4.3.14.39 allows attacker to access some file as Samsung Notes permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-25405|2024-08-03T20:03:05.573Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in ScreenOffActivity in Samsung Notes prior to version 4.2.04.27 allows untrusted applications to access local files.

item.title: CVE-2021-25367|2024-08-03T20:03:05.341Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Path Traversal vulnerability in Samsung Notes prior to version 4.2.00.22 allows attackers to access local files without permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-25493|2024-08-03T20:03:05.614Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Lack of boundary checking of a buffer in libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Note version 4.3.02.61 allows OOB read

item.title: CVE-2021-25402|2024-08-03T20:03:05.594Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Information Exposure vulnerability in Samsung Notes prior to version 4.2.04.27 allows attacker to access s pen latency information.

item.title: CVE-2021-25494|2024-08-03T20:03:05.764Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: A possible buffer overflow vulnerability in libSPenBase library of Samsung Notes prior to Samsung Note version 4.3.02.61 allows arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-20868|2024-06-04T17:40:20.131Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Improper input validation in Samsung Notes prior to version 4.4.15 allows local attackers to delete files with Samsung Notes privilege under certain conditions.

item.title: CVE-2024-20868|2024-08-01T22:06:36.886Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20notes
item.description: Improper input validation in Samsung Notes prior to version 4.4.15 allows local attackers to delete files with Samsung Notes privilege under certain conditions.
